DOC.brief_title: Biopsychosocial Impact Caregivers Patients Undergoing Joint Spine Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: This pilot feasibility study goal enrol 50 caregiver surgical subgroup , total 150 subject . Caregivers patient undergo surgery administer Patient Reported Outcome Measurement Information System ( PROMIS ) measure preoperatively , 7 day postoperatively , 14 day postoperatively , 1 month postoperatively . PROMIS item bank include Global Health , Anxiety , Fatigue , Depression , Self Efficacy , Social Satisfaction , Sleep Disturbance . If caregiver report presence persistent pain , Pain Interference Physical Function administer .
